arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli v Fiorentina: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: The Tuscan derby promises to be an entertaining one, with high-flying Empoli still unbeaten, while Fiorentina will be looking to build on their first win of the season against Lazio. Empoli are expected to maintain their effective attacking duo of Colombo and Esposito up front, with Ardian Ismajli leading a formidable backline that has allowed only four goals in their first five Serie A matches. Fiorentina may give Gudmundsson his first start, potentially invigorating their offense. arts.ttl: Empoli vs. Fiorentina, Tuscan derby at 18:00 CEST
arts.sum: This is only the third time that Empoli have faced Fiorentina in Serie A with more points in the standings at the start of the matchday than their opposition: in the previous two, the Viola won (2-1 in October 2006) and the pair drew the other (1-1 in February 2023). Empoli have remained unbeaten in their first five Serie A matches for the first time in the competition (W2 D3); overall, the only Tuscan team to have gone unbeaten in their first six games of a single top-flight campaign in the last 40 years were Fiorentina in 2007/08.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli v Fiorentina: Match Preview
arts.sum: The Stadio Carlo Castellani is set to host a captivating Tuscan derby on Sunday evening as high-flying Empoli welcome regional rivals Fiorentina in a crucial Serie A clash. Empoli have made their best-ever start to a Serie A campaign, remaining unbeaten after five matches with two wins and three draws. Roberto D’Aversa’s side have defied expectations, securing impressive results against Champions League qualifiers Bologna and Juventus, while also stunning Roma in the capital. The Azzurri’s excellent form continued last weekend with a 2-0 victory at Cagliari, thanks to goals from Lorenzo Colombo and Sebastiano Esposito.
